mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, sal, hiredate, job, deptno FROM emp
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp ( empno, ename, job, sal, hiredate, deptno ) VALUES ( #{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{sal}, NOW(), #{deptno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET ename = #{ename}, job = #{job}, sal = #{sal}, WHERE empno = #{empno}
mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.ename, e.job, e.deptno, d.dname, d.loc FROM emp AS e INNER JOIN dept AS d ON e.deptno = d.deptno
